class.name: wxRichTextCtrl
class.description:
wxRichTextCtrl provides a generic, ground-up implementation of a text control capable of showing multiple styles and images.

wxRichTextCtrl sends notification events: see wxRichTextEvent.

It also sends the standard wxTextCtrl events wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_ENTER and wxEVT_COMMAND_TEXT_UPDATED, and wxTextUrlEvent when URL content is clicked.

For more information, see the wxRichTextCtrl Overview.

flag.name: wxRE_CENTRE_CARET
flag.description: The control will try to keep the caret line centred vertically while editing. wxRE_CENTER_CARET is a synonym for this style.

flag.name: wxRE_READONLY
flag.description: The control will not be editable.

text.name: value
text.label: Value
text.description: Initial value of the control (default: empty).

int.name: maxlength
int.label: Max length
int.description: Maximum length of the text entered (default: unlimited).
